tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE grant_details (
  grant_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  grant_name VARCHAR,
  grant_amount DECIMAL,
  application_deadline DATE,
  approval_deadline DATE
)

CREATE TABLE grant_details (
  grant_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  grant_name TEXT NOT NULL,
  grant_amount DECIMAL NOT NULL,
  application_deadline TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE grant_recipients (
  recipient_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  grant_id UUID NOT NULL,
  recipient_name TEXT NOT NULL,
  award_amount DECIMAL NOT NULL,
  award_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (grant_id) REFERENCES grant_details(grant_id)
)

CREATE TABLE grant_reviews (
  review_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  grant_id UUID NOT NULL,
  reviewer_name TEXT NOT NULL,
  review_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  review_comments TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (grant_id) REFERENCES grant_details(grant_id)
)

CREATE TABLE grant_details (
  grant_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  grant_name VARCHAR(255),
  grant_amount DECIMAL,
  grant_description TEXT,
  deadline DATE
);

CREATE TABLE grant_management (
  grant_manager_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  grant_id INT,
  manager_name VARCHAR(255),
  manager_email VARCHAR(255),
  CONSTRAINT fk_grant_id FOREIGN KEY (grant_id) REFERENCES grant_details(grant_id)
);

CREATE TABLE grant_applications (
  application_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  grant_id INT,
  applicant_name VARCHAR(255),
  application_date DATE,
  application_status VARCHAR(50),
  CONSTRAINT fk_grant_id FOREIGN KEY (grant_id) REFERENCES grant_details(grant_id)
);

CREATE TABLE grant_reviews (
  review_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  application_id INT,
  reviewer_name VARCHAR(255),
  review_comments TEXT,
  review_date DATE,
  recommendation VARCHAR(50),
  CONSTRAINT fk_application_id FOREIGN KEY (application_id) REFERENCES grant_applications(application_id)
);

CREATE TABLE grants (
  grant_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  grant_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  grant_description TEXT,
  grant_amount DECIMAL(10,2),
  grant_deadline DATE
)

CREATE TABLE grant_applicants (
  applicant_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  applicant_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  applicant_email VARCHAR(255) UNIQUE,
  applicant_address TEXT,
  grant_id UUID
)

CREATE TABLE grant_reviews (
  review_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  reviewer_id UUID,
  grant_id UUID,
  review_date DATE,
  review_comments TEXT,
  review_score INT
)

CREATE TABLE grant_requirements (
  requirement_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  requirement_description TEXT,
  grant_id UUID
)

CREATE TABLE grant_status (
  status_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  grant_id UUID,
  status VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  status_date DATE
)
